SongLyrics.JpnStr: 君[きみ]のせい 君[きみ]のせい 君[きみ]のせいで 私[わたし]
SongLyrics.EngStr: It's your fault, your fault, because of you.

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 臆病[おくびょう]で かっこつかない
SongLyrics.EngStr: I'm timid and uncool.

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 君[きみ]のせいだよ
SongLyrics.EngStr: It's all your fault.

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 少[すこ]し 伸[の]びた 前髪[まえがみ]に 隠[かく]れてる 君[きみ]の 目[め]
SongLyrics.EngStr: Your eyes are hidden under your slightly long bangs.

SongLyrics.JpnStr: ちょっとどこ 見[み]てんの? こっちに 来[き]て!
SongLyrics.EngStr: Hey, where are you looking? Come here!

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 君[きみ]が 私[わたし]を 夢中[むちゅう]にさせるのに 難[むずか]しい 事[こと]は 一[ひと]つもない
SongLyrics.EngStr: It's so easy for you to make me crazy about you.

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 夕方[ゆうがた]の 駅[えき]の ホーム 波[なみ]の 音[おと]
SongLyrics.EngStr: The sound of waves on the station platform in the evening.

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 黙[だま]る 私[わたし]を 見透[みす]かしたように
SongLyrics.EngStr: You see right through me when I stay silent.

SongLyrics.JpnStr: そんな 風[ふう]に 笑[わら]わないで
SongLyrics.EngStr: Don't laugh at me like that.

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 君[きみ]のせい 君[きみ]のせい 君[きみ]のせいで 私[わたし]
SongLyrics.EngStr: It's your fault, your fault, because of you.

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 臆病[おくびょう]で かっこつかない
SongLyrics.EngStr: I'm timid and uncool.

SongLyrics.JpnStr: こんなはずじゃないのに
SongLyrics.EngStr: It shouldn't be like this.

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 君[きみ]のせい 君[きみ]のせい 君[きみ]のせいで 私[わたし]
SongLyrics.EngStr: It's your fault, your fault, because of you.

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 誰[だれ]かを 嫌[きら]いになるの?
SongLyrics.EngStr: Am I going to hate someone because of you?

SongLyrics.JpnStr: こんな 夜[よる]は 胸騒[むなさわ]ぎしか しないよ
SongLyrics.EngStr: This kind of night only makes my heart restless.

SongLyrics.JpnStr: ハートの マシンガン 構[かま]えて
SongLyrics.EngStr: I aim my heart's machine gun.

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 余裕[よゆう] ぶっこいてる 君[きみ]に 狙[ねら]い 撃[う]ちするのさ
SongLyrics.EngStr: I'll take aim at you, acting so confident.

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 今[いま]も 少[すこ]し 痛[いた]む 傷[きず] 隠[かく]してる
SongLyrics.EngStr: I'm still hiding a small wound that hurts.

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 制服[せいふく] 脱[ぬ]いだって 見[み]えやしない ほんとの こころ
SongLyrics.EngStr: Even if I take off my uniform, you can't see my true heart.

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 二人[ふたり] 並[なら]んで 歩[ある]いても 微妙[びみょう]すぎる 距離感[きょりかん]
SongLyrics.EngStr: Even when we walk side by side, the distance between us feels too subtle.

SongLyrics.JpnStr: もっと 近付[ちかづ]いてよ
SongLyrics.EngStr: Get closer to me.

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 最低[さいてい]な 言葉[ことば] 言[い]ってみたりした
SongLyrics.EngStr: I tried saying the worst things.

SongLyrics.JpnStr: カワイソウな 女[おんな]の 子[こ]ってやつに
SongLyrics.EngStr: I didn't want to become one of those 'pitiful girls.'

SongLyrics.JpnStr: ならないための 予防線[よぼうせん]
SongLyrics.EngStr: It's a precaution so that I don't become that.

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 君[きみ]のせい 君[きみ]のせい 君[きみ]のせいで 私[わたし]
SongLyrics.EngStr: It's your fault, your fault, because of you.

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 忘[わす]れられない 事[こと]ばっか
SongLyrics.EngStr: All I have are unforgettable memories.

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 増[ふ]えていって 困[こま]るなぁ
SongLyrics.EngStr: They're increasing, and it's troubling.

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 君[きみ]のせい 君[きみ]のせい 君[きみ]のせいで 今[いま]ね
SongLyrics.EngStr: It's your fault, your fault, and now...

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 私[わたし]は 綺麗[きれい]になるの
SongLyrics.EngStr: I am becoming more beautiful.

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 君[きみ]じゃなきゃ 嫌[いや]だって 言[い]いたい 今[います]ぐ
SongLyrics.EngStr: I want to say 'I need you,' right now.

SongLyrics.JpnStr: ひとりきりの 夜[よる]と ずっと ここで 待[ま]っていたんだよ
SongLyrics.EngStr: I've been waiting here for you, all alone at night.

SongLyrics.EngStr: It's your fault, your fault, because of you.

SongLyrics.EngStr: I'm timid and uncool.

SongLyrics.EngStr: It shouldn't be like this.

SongLyrics.EngStr: It's your fault, your fault, because of you.

SongLyrics.EngStr: Am I going to hate someone because of you?

SongLyrics.EngStr: This kind of night only makes my heart restless.

SongLyrics.EngStr: I aim my heart's machine gun.

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 余裕[よゆう] ぶっこいてる 君[きみ]に 狙[ねら]い 撃[う]ちするのさ
SongLyrics.EngStr: I'll take aim at you, acting so confident.
